attributes.action: stop planning reforms that will enable public opposition to be side stepped:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Proposed planning reforms, it is said, will enable ministers to sidestep public opposition and smooth the way for bigger airports, roads, power stations and other major building projects. 

See Peter Hetherington report in the Guardian for details

http://society.guardian.co.uk/societyguardian/story/0,,2074654,00.html
